the_case: Let me make the case for strong atheist who views organized religion as a control mechanism, not genuine spirituality.. You don't believe in God and see Christianity specifically as hypocritical and manipulative. You distinguish between "spirituality" (which could be real) and "religion" (which you see as man-made control). You've had negative experiences with church people and think religious belief is a "bastardization of true spirituality."
